About Us

Hutchens Industries, Inc. is a leader in the design and manufacture of spring suspensions and sliding subframes for the trailer industry. Since Hutchens Industries was established in 1950 by C. Ted Hutchens, the company has always remained a closely-held, family owned business. Lewis succeeded his father in the 1960’s, who was then succeeded by his son, Jeff, our current president and CEO.

Whether it’s for a van, flatbed, chassis or specialty trailer application, we have the experience to meet your trailer suspension needs. Hutchens will work with you to find the best solutions that meet your payload requirements, maintenance concerns, and other demands that relate to your Total Cost of Ownership. Our focus to find the best solutions is why more trailer manufacturers and fleet owners put their trust in Hutchens Industries.

Hutchens also offers Fabrication Services for projects outside of our typical suspension-related work. Tell us about the specific needs of your upcoming projects and we’ll see how our capabilities in these fabrication services – such as laser cutting, stamping, press braking and welding – could help.

We are Hutchens. Generations of support.
